main event: A motorist reported a sighting of a bell-shaped object flying over the road near Ulysses, Kansas on September 11, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as a dull copper color with no visible motors or lights,The object was estimated to be bigger than the width of a highway,The motorist had to brake hard to avoid colliding with the object,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object exhibited great speed and maneuverability, disappearing in less than 5 seconds.
witness description: A 46-year-old woman from Ponca City, Oklahoma
